feed.title: How accurate are the Bitcoin timestamps?

entry.title: How accurate are the Bitcoin timestamps?
entry.summary: In a discussion about the accuracy of Bitcoin timestamps, Neiman asked for clarification on the matter. Bryan, a participant in the conversation, shared a link to a perspective on block timestamp and opentimestamps from the public-blockchain archives. The link provides additional information on the topic. Additionally, Bryan included his personal website and contact information for future discussions.
